entry.title: Holidays, wireless exams, and other updates
entry.summary: I have been swamped over the last month. I spent a fantastic holiday in Italy with my loved ones, visiting Rome by night, exploring Villa D'Este in Tivoli and overeating Abruzzese food. Follows a nice shot I took at the Tremiti Islands in Apulia for my future self to remember â€¦
entry.content:
I have been swamped over the last month. I spent a fantastic holiday in Italy with my loved ones, visiting Rome by night, exploring Villa D'Este in Tivoli and overeating Abruzzese food. Follows a nice shot I took at the Tremiti Islands in Apulia for my future self to remember what is important:

I had the chance to connect to the 2m radio repeater near my parent's house for the first time after getting my full ham license and talk to quite a few folks in Abruzzo.

I also dedicated time to professional development as I felt times were mature to sit an exam I failed in 2020. I passed Designing Cisco Enterprise Networks (ENWLSD, 300-420) last Friday. I felt great when I passed, as it was a good challenge. I also signed up for the Wireless LAN Professionals Conference in Prague in October this year; I can't wait to meet people there.

In conclusion, here is a picture of my grandmother's dogs, Dido (left) and Giorgino (right):
